t: Pinetop Perkins - The Complete Hightone Sessions - Amazon.com Music
s: If you love the blues...especially on piano you can't go wrong with Pinetop Perkins. He is one of the best that ever lived. Please forgive me for dropping names but I met "Top" when he was in his mid-80s and he was a really down to earth, humble sweetheart of a man.

t: Heaven: CDs & Vinyl - Pinetop Perkins
s: Mr Perkins finger can be said to float across the piano keys and the vocals come across smooth and rich. Great music by a dearly missed artist. RIP Pinetop. ...
